subject: Sexual Health
title: At-Home Testing
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on At-Home Testing.

hook.text: You can now test for several STIs from the privacy of your own home with a mail-in kit.

buildup.text: Home kits typically include swabs or finger-prick blood collectors that you mail to a certified lab.

discovery.text: Results arrive online within days, often with access to a telehealth consultation if positive.

twist.text: Home tests are accurate for many STIs but may miss some infections that require clinical swabs.

climax.text: For people who avoid clinics due to stigma or inconvenience, home testing removes a major barrier.

punchline.text: Privacy removes barriers. More testing saves lives.

quiz.question: What is a key benefit of at-home STI testing?
options: It removes barriers like stigma and inconvenience
